duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide designs for the glass and ceramics industries, molten metals, and minerals.
Design fixtures/parts with input from engineering manager.
Monitor the cost and effectiveness of activities to optimize resources, prioritize spending, and maintain professional standards.
Manage production change/improvement requests and implementing changes.
Analyze product or equipment specifications to determine designs.
Prepare or direct preparations of product or system layout and detailed drawings, and standards.

education_certification.credential: B.S Degree in Engineering discipline (Mechanical Engineering is ideal)
